title: Services at post offices to be limited
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Posts has decided to limit public service hours of post offices due to the current fuel crisis and other reasons.
Deputy Post Master General, Rajitha Ranasinghe stated that the public services at all post offices will end at 5 PM.
Kerawalapitiya Power Plant stops electricity generation as it has run out of fuel
